thread.title: Mongolian competitors crowned at Little Miss World 2015
thread.title_full: Mongolian competitors crowned at Little Miss World 2015

author: The UB Post
title: Mongolian competitors crowned at Little Miss World 2015
text:
Thursday, October 15th,   Mongolian competitors crowned at Little Miss World 2015 
Six-year-old M.Gereltekh was crowned Tiny Little Miss World prize at Little Miss World 2015, which took place from September 27 to October 3 in Antalya, Turkey. The 15th Little Miss World pageant had 42 participants from 19 countries, namely England, Italy, Kosovo, Ukraine, Hungary, Georgia, Armenia, Russia, South Africa, Lesotho, Nepal, Kazakhstan, Tatarstan, Mongolia, China, Malaysia, Thailand, Brazil, and the United States. The two Mongolian contestants participated in Little Miss World for the first time this year. B.Odmaa and M.Gereltekh represented Mongolia in the competition. B.Odmaa won in the best dancer and best princess categories. Naran Group gave a special congratulations to winners B.Odmaa and M.Gereltekh after they returned home. Mongolian contestants will be prepared for future Little Miss World competitions.
